title: Whos better? Kled or Illaioi?
body: Im thinking of bying my first champ either Illaoi or Kled. Ive played illaoi before and she can be pretty fun but i heard Kled is pretty fun to, and also who would be better to climb throught the low elo with? Thnx

replies.body: I feel like Kled is a better carry. Illaoi requires the enemy to be either dumb or your team to have good CC so she can kill everyone with her ult.
